page.title: 16The Elderly in Scunthorpe
page.content: Much is done to make life easier for {elderly people.}In our area we have several{different kinds of housing used by old people. Some elderly couples who are able to look after themselves live in {bungalows}grouped together and have meals supplied by a{"meals on wheels" service. Other elderly people are looked after by others in two{private {homes}where they have to pay about Â£120 a week. Others live in three big{blocks}where they have small flats of their own and look after themselves but with a {warden}to help if needed. Finally there is a{Day Centre}where old people can go to meet and talk, receive advice or just find company. There is no need for anybody to be lonely.
